title: Will he kill more than half a million sharks for a COVID-19 vaccine?
subtitle: Natural oil produced in shark liver is often used - but not always - in the manufacture of vaccines.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The shark allies, a shark conservation group, estimated that up to 550,000 wild sharks could be killed by squalin, a natural chemical found in their liver, to produce a COVID-19 vaccine.
